src_original: tatra kathaṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ paśyati?
tgt_original: 「云何見緣生？

src_original: ihoktaṃ bhagavatā- ya imaṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ satatasamitaṃ nirjīvaṃ yathāvadaviparītamajīvamajātamabhūtamakṛtamasaṃskṛtamapratighamanālambanaṃ
tgt_original: 如來說此緣生常住、無人、無我、無眾生、無壽命、不顛倒、無生、無作、無為、無對、無礙。

src_original: śivamabhayamanāhāryamavyayamavyupaśamasvabhāvaṃ paśyati,  yastu evaṃ satatasamitaṃ nirjīvam- ityādi pūrvavat yāvat- avyupaśamasvabhāvaṃ paśyati so 'nuttaradharmaśarīraṃ buddhaṃ paśyati /
tgt_original: 見自性寂靜，即見法。 若見如是種類常住、無人、無我、無眾生、無壽命、不顛倒、無生、無對、無礙，是即見法。

src_original: pratītyasamutpāda iti kasmāducyate?
tgt_original: 「緣生者是何義？

src_original: sahetukaḥ sapratyayo nāhetuko nāpratyaya ityucyate /
tgt_original: 」答言： 「有因、有緣，非無因緣，名為緣生，而於此中如來略說緣生之相。

src_original: atha ca punarayaṃ pratītyasamutpādo dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāmutpadyate /
tgt_original: 「復次緣生者，由二種因起。

src_original: katamābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāmutpadyate?
tgt_original: 云何為二？

src_original: so 'pi dvividho draṣṭavyaḥ- bāhyaścādhyātmikaśca /
tgt_original: 其緣生法應知二種，所謂外、內。

src_original: tatra avidyā katamā?
tgt_original: 「云何無明？

src_original: eteṣāmeva ṣaṇṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ yā ekasaṃjñā piṇḍasaṃjñā nityasaṃjñā dhruvasaṃjñā śāśvatasaṃjñā  sukhasaṃjñā ātmasaṃjñā sattvasaṃjñā jīvasaṃjñā jantusaṃjñā manujasaṃjñā mānavasaṃjñā  ahaṃkāramamakārasaṃjñā /
tgt_original: 於此六界起一想、合想、常想、堅想、常恒想、樂想、靜想、眾生想、命想、壽者想、意生想、儒童想、吾我作者想。

src_original: iyamucyate 'vidyā /
tgt_original: 生如是種種無知，名為無明。

src_original: evamavidyāyāṃ satyāṃ viṣayeṣu rāgadveṣamohāḥ pravartante /  tatra ye rāgadveṣamohā viṣayeṣu,  amī avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā iutyucyante /
tgt_original: 於如是有無明境界生貪、瞋、癡，於彼貪、瞋、癡生行。

src_original: vastuprativijñaptirvijñānam /  catvāri mahābhūtāni copādāya rūpamaikadhyarūpam /  vijñānasahajāścatvāro 'rūpiṇa upādānaskandhā nāma,
tgt_original: 於彼事施設，名為識，其識生四蘊。

src_original: nāmarūpasaṃniśritāni indriyāṇi ṣaḍāyatanam /
tgt_original: 彼名色所依諸根則六處。

src_original: trayāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ saṃnipātaḥ sparśaḥ /
tgt_original: 三法和合名為觸。

src_original: sparśānubhavo vedanā /
tgt_original: 觸生受。

src_original: vedanādhyavasānaṃ tṛṣṇā /  tṛṣṇāvaipulyamupādānam /  upādānanirjātaṃ punarbhavajanakaṃ karma bhavaḥ /
tgt_original: 受耽著，故生愛。 愛廣大，故名為取。 取復生有。

src_original: bhavahetukaḥ skandhaprādurbhāvo jātiḥ /
tgt_original: 業有作因生蘊。

src_original: jātyabhinirvṛttānāṃ skandhānāṃ paripāko jarā /
tgt_original: 蘊熟，故名老；

src_original: skandhavināśo maraṇam /
tgt_original: 蘊壞，故名死；

src_original: punaraparaṃ tattve 'pratipattirmithyāpratipattirajñānamavidyā /
tgt_original: 無知，名無明。

src_original: evamavidyāyāṃ satyāṃ trividhāḥ saṃskārā abhinirvartante puṇyopagāḥ,  apuṇyopagāḥ ānañjayopagāśca /
tgt_original: 有無明故，種種造作福近行行、非福近行行、不動近行行。

src_original: ime ucyante avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā iti /  puṇyopagānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ puṇyopagameva vijñānaṃ bhavati,  apuṇyopagānāṃ saṃskārāṇāmapuṇyopagameva vijñānaṃ bhavati,  ānañjyopagānāṃ saṃskārāṇāmānañjyopagameva vijñānaṃ bhavati /
tgt_original: 起福近行行、非福近行行者，故名為識，是故名為無明緣行。 起非福近行行、非福近行行者，亦即是識，是故名行緣識。

src_original: idamucyate saṃskārapratyayaṃ vijñānamiti /  tadeva vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpam /
tgt_original: 起不動近行行、不動近行行者，亦是於識，是故名為識緣名色。

src_original: nāmarūpavivṛddhyā ṣaḍbhirāyatanadvāraiḥ kṛtyakriyāḥ pravartante,  tannāmarūpapratyayaṃ ṣaḍāyatanamucyate /
tgt_original: 名色增長作六處門，是故名為名色緣六處。

src_original: ṣaḍbhya āyatanebhyaḥ ṣaṭ sparśakāyāḥ pravartante /  ayaṃ ṣaḍāyatanapratyayaḥ sparśa ityucyate /
tgt_original: 六處身轉，是故名為六處緣觸。

src_original: yajjātīyaḥ sparśo bhavati tajjātīyā vedanā pravartate /  iyaṃ sparśapratyayā vedanetyucyate /  yastāṃ vedayati,
tgt_original: 同類觸生同類受，是故觸緣受。

src_original: abhinandayati,  adhyavasyati,  adhitiṣṭhati,  sā vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇetyucyate /  āsvadanā, abhinandanā,
tgt_original: 於受差別耽著喜悅，是故名為受緣愛。

src_original: adhyavasāyasthānam,  ātmapriyarūpasātarūpairviyogo mā bhavatviti aparityāgo bhūyo bhūyaśca prārthanā,  idaṃ tṛṣṇāpratyayamupādānamityucyate /
tgt_original: 愛耽著樂，故愛不捨，數數忻求，故名為愛緣取。

src_original: evaṃ prārthayamānaḥ punarbhavajanakaṃ karma samutthāpayatti kāyena vācā manasā,  sa upādānapratyayo bhava ityucyate /
tgt_original: 如是營求，復生有起業於身、於語、於意，是故名為取緣有。

src_original: tatkarmanirjātānāṃ pañcaskandhānāmabhinirvṛttiryā,  sā bhavapratyayā jātirityucyate /
tgt_original: 從業生五蘊轉，名為有緣生。

src_original: yā (yo) jātyabhinirvṛttānāṃ skandhānāmupacayaparipākādvināśo bhavati,  tadidaṃ jātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇamityucyate /
tgt_original: 從生蘊令熟壞滅，名生緣老死。 如是名為十二緣生。

src_original: tatra vijñānaṃ bījasvabhāvatvena hetuḥ /  karma kṣetrasvabhāvatvena hetuḥ /  avidyā tṛṣṇā ca kleśasvabhāvatvena hetuḥ /
tgt_original: 所謂無明、愛、業、識。 是識種子自性為因，業田自性為因，無明、愛、煩惱自性為因。

src_original: karmakleśā vijñānabījaṃ saṃjanayanti /
tgt_original: 業、煩惱、識能生種子。
